iati-activity.title: Klimaangepasste Stadtentwicklung in Khulna
Climate change adapted urban development in Khulna
iati-activity.description: Verbesserung der Lebensbedingungen der Einwohner durch eine zukunftsfähige und umweltgerechte Infrastruktur
The Financial Contribution is exclusively for sub-projects for the improvement of transport-related urban infrastructure in Khulna with a focus on poverty reduction and adaption to climate change.
